mapper.update: update itrip_plans set plan_name = #{planName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_out = #{planOut,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, plan_arrive = #{planArrive,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, plan_address = #{planAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_destination = #{planDestination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_punctualityrate = #{planPunctualityrate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aviation_id = #{aviationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shipping_id = #{shippingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Take_id = #{takeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hctype_id = #{hctypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select plan_id, plan_name, plan_out, plan_arrive, plan_address, plan_destination, plan_punctualityrate, aviation_id, type_id, shipping_id, Take_id, hctype_id from itrip_plans where plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select plan_id, plan_name, plan_out, plan_arrive, plan_address, plan_destination, plan_punctualityrate, aviation_id, type_id, shipping_id, Take_id, hctype_id from itrip_plans
